name: Tanium Detect
description: This app integrates with Tanium Detect to perform several investigate, generic, and ingest type of actions

base_url.description: IP or Hostname of Tanium Server

actions.description: Validate the asset configuration for connectivity using supplied configuration
Get a suppression rule by ID

id.description: The ID of the suppression rule

actions.description: Create a new suppression rule

name.description: The name for the new rule

config.description: The new config for the rule

description.description: The new description for the rule

inteldocid.description: The ID of the intel doc to associate the rule to

actions.description: List all available suppression rules in the system

limit.description: The maximum number of rules to return. (Default: 100)

actions.description: Delete one suppression rule

id.description: The ID of the rule to delete

actions.description: Get a single source by ID

id.description: The ID of the source to show

actions.description: Delete an existing source by ID

id.description: The ID of the source to delete

actions.description: List sources configured to manage IOC's in the system

limit.description: The maximum number of sources to return. (Default: 100)

actions.description: Show details for a single source type by ID

id.description: The ID of the source type to get

actions.description: List source types supported on this system
List notification counts for the last N days in UTC by default

num_days.description: Past number of days to account for (Default: 30)

inteldocid.description: Intel doc ID to filter by

scanconfigid.description: Scan config ID to filter by

actions.description: Show a single notification by ID

id.description: The ID of the notification to show

actions.description: Update the state of one notification by ID

id.description: The ID of the notification to update

state.description: The new state for the notification

actions.description: List notifications with optional filtering, sorting, and pagination

type.description: Filter notifications by the specified type(s)

sort.description: A comma-separated list of +/- pairs controlling sort ordering

limit.description: The maximum number of notifications to return. (Default: 100)

offset.description: The offset at which to begin listing notifications

actions.description: Delete one notification by ID

id.description: The ID of the notification to delete

actions.description: Modify the properties of an existing label by ID

id.description: The ID of the label to update

name.description: The new name for the label

description.description: The new description for the label

actions.description: Request a single label by ID

id.description: The ID of the label to get

actions.description: Delete an existing label by ID. Will fail if label is used in group configurations

id.description: The ID of the label that will be deleted

actions.description: Create a new label

name.description: User facing text to show for the label

actions.description: List all available labels in the system

limit.description: The maximum number of labels to return. (Default: 100)

actions.description: Show a single Intel Document by ID

id.description: The ID of the intel document to show

actions.description: Delete the identified intel document by ID

id.description: The ID of the intel document to delete

actions.description: List intel documents

name.description: Include only IntelDocs whose "name" matches the given field

description.description: Include only IntelDocs whose "description" matches the given field

type.description: Include only IntelDocs whose "type" matches the given field

sort.description: Use to sort columns using "+/-", comma-separate for multiples. Ex: -alertedAt,+name

limit.description: The maximum number of IntelDocs to return. (Default: 100)

offset.description: The offset number to begin listing alerts

nolimit.description: If TRUE, it will not limit the number of items returned

actions.description: List alert counts grouped by computer name or intel id

groupby.description: Group alerts by specified group name (Default: 'computerName')

actions.description: List alert counts for the last N days, in UTC by default

num_days.description: Past number of days to account for (Default: 30)

inteldocid.description: Filter by alerts with specified intel doc ID

scanconfigid.description: Filter by alerts with the specified scan config ID

actions.description: Show a single alert by ID

id.description: The ID of the alert to show

actions.description: Update the state of an alert

id.description: The ID of the alert to update

state.description: The new state for the alert

actions.description: List alerts with optional filtering, sorting, and pagination

state.description: Filter alerts by the specified states

type.description: Filter alerts by the specified types

priority.description: Filter alerts by they specified priorities

severity.description: Filter alerts by the specified severities

inteldocid.description: Filter alerts by the specified intelDocIds

scanconfigid.description: Filter alerts by the specified scanConfigIds

computername.description: Filter alerts by the specified computerNames

computeripaddress.description: Filter alerts by the specified computerIpAddresses

sort.description: Use to sort columns using "+/-", comma separate for multiples

limit.description: The maximum number of alerts to return. (Default: 100)

offset.description: The offset number to begin listing alerts

actions.description: Delete an alert by ID

id.description: ID of the alerts to delete

actions.description: Callback action for the on_poll ingest functionality

container_id.description: Container IDs to limit the ingestion to

start_time.description: Start of time range, in epoch time (milliseconds)
start_time.verbose: If not specified, the default is past 10 days.

end_time.description: End of time range, in epoch time (milliseconds)
end_time.verbose: If not specified, the default is now.

container_count.description: Maximum number of container records to query for

artifact_count.description: Maximum number of artifact records to query for
